data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Gaviota State Park, California, USA (ALE)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Gaviota State Park, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2006-11-02. The instrument depth was 003 meters, in an overall water depth of 015 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
